summary: Based on the true story of the serial killer Jeffrey Dahmer, the events within the family behind, and leading up to his capture.
cast: Bo Svenson|Scott Cordes|Cathy Barnett|Rusty Sneary|Luke Adams|Lucille Louise|Jeannine Hutchings|Frankie Krainz|Kip Niven|Granvile O'Neal|Walter Coppage|Erin McGrane|Jeph Scanlon|Kaitlyn Williams|Kathleen Warfel|Anne Peterson|Charles Fugate|Valissa Smith|Craig Benton|Christopher Wheatley|Ric Averill|Troy Moore|Jeffrey Fellin|Roger Strong|Dan Nichols|Cheryl Weaver|Yve James|Quinn Van Camp|David Babcock|Deb Keeney|James Kellogg|Shannon Knopke|Nick Lamendola|Holly Maksudian|James M. Myers|Nick Padgett|Yve Rojas|Daniel Compo|E.J. Tangonan
title: Raising Jeffrey Dahmer
